      • appliesTo

        public boolean appliesTo(java.lang.Class<?> kind)
        Check whether this DateFilter can be applied to a given query kind.

        A DateFilter can be applied to Activity and ActivitySlice queries.

        Overrides:

      • process

        public <A extends Activity> void process(java.util.List<A> activities)
        Process the resulting list of activities, making sure they fall within the specified date boundaries. This processing only needs to be done when all of following conditions are met:
        • Both date boundaries are specified.

          If one of the boundaries is not specified, the filters applied on the activity query will produce exact results.

        • At least one of the boundaries was rounded.

          If the boundaries are round hours and the distance between them is large enough, the filters applied on the activity slice query will produce exact queries.

        Overrides:
        process in class Option
        Parameters:
        activities - The list of activities.

      • roundBoundaries

        protected void roundBoundaries()
        Round the date boundaries.
